definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Shu Bote living in classicism and romanticism of the transition period.
sentences.chinese: 舒柏特生活在古典主义和浪漫主义的交接时期。

sentences.english: A Romanticist reading comic books under the tree, loves to be in a daydreaming.
sentences.chinese: 阿浪漫主义读漫画书的树，喜欢在一个白日梦。

sentences.english: As far as the writing technique is concerned, the Tang poetry combined realism and romanticism.
sentences.chinese: 唐诗在创作方法上，现实主义与浪漫主义并举。

sentences.english: The portrait, painted in a simple but elegant style, has a romantic flavor.
sentences.chinese: 画面墨淡气雅，设色颇有浪漫主义韵味。

sentences.english: The Romantic Ideology is an amalgam of two titles.
sentences.chinese: 《浪漫主义意识形态》的题目是两个题目的融合。

sentences.english: The romanticism "Gotterdammerung" has since been on the wane after Wagner.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫主义的“神界”在瓦格纳之后，开始走向了黄昏。

sentences.english: Xu Zhimo was a famous modern romantic poet of 20C.
sentences.chinese: 徐志摩是20世纪著名的现代浪漫主义诗人。

sentences.english: The article is divided into three parts:The first chapter is to analyze tendencies of Romanticism of Liang Shi Qiu's Literary Thought about sublimity .
sentences.chinese: 第一章是分析梁实秋浪漫主义倾向的崇高文艺思想。

sentences.english: But then the vampire became a romantic hero and everything changed.
sentences.chinese: 但是后来吸血鬼成了浪漫主义的英雄，一切都变了。

sentences.english: It reinforced LI Bai's romanticism literature theory.
sentences.chinese: 它是对李白浪漫主义文学思想的补充。

sentences.english: His whole nature was kindled into one intense and passionate effervescence of romantic passion.
sentences.chinese: 他心灵中燃烧着一股强烈而炽热的浪漫主义激情。
李白是一个浪漫主义诗人。

sentences.english: There's profound romanticism in his poetries.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗作带有很深厚的浪漫主义色彩。

sentences.english: His landscapes are amiable and mystic, these always give people uneasy feelings of equilibriums.
sentences.chinese: 弗利德里希，是早期浪漫主义风景画的代表人物。
是巴洛克式的还是浪漫主义的？

sentences.english: LiBai was also a positive romanticism master.
sentences.chinese: 同时他也是一个积极浪漫主义大师。
